file.name: additionalProperties.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
- url: http://swagger.io/show-bug
info:
  title: Test API
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/tests":
    get:
      operationId: listTests
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns results.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "./globals.yaml#/components/schemas/result"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /tests: get: operation "listTests": responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: resolve "./globals.yaml#/components/schemas/result": external "./globals.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
